short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that imports paper metadata from Crossref to Notion using a DOI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that retrieves paper metadata from Crossref using a DOI and imports it directly to a Notion database. This extension will simplify the process of collecting and organizing research paper information with minimal effort.
